import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { users = [ {ID:1, name: "Osama bin Laden"}, {ID:2, name: "Naruto Uzumaki"}, {ID:3, name: "Junker Otto Eduard Leopold von Bismarck"} ]; cuadroNombre:string=""; }
